original_text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.
korean_text: 사마리아인들이 예수께 와서 자기들과 함께 유하시기를 청하니 거기서 이틀을 유하시매

sentences.original_text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him,
that he would tarry with them:
and he abode there two days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 거기서 이틀 동안 머물렀습니다.
